item.text: So Agrippa said to Paul, “You have permission to speak for yourself.” Then Paul held out his hand and began his defense:
“Regarding all the things I have been accused of by the Jews, King Agrippa, I consider myself fortunate that I am about to make my defense before you today,

because <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3122" class="">especially</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1109" class="">familiar</st> with <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1485" class="">customs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2213">controversial issues</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>. <st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="1189" class="">ask</st><n id="3" /> you to <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3116" class="">patiently</st>.

<st data-num="3767">Now</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1492">know</st> the way I <st data-num="1096">lived</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3503" class="">youth</st>, <st data-num="981" class="">spending</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="981" class="">life</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my own</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="3" />

They know<n id="1" /> because they have <st data-num="4267" class="">known</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="509">from time past</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> they are <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st> to <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2696">according to</st> the <st data-num="196" class="">strictest</st> <st data-num="139" class="">party</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="2251" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2356" class="">religion</st>, I <st data-num="2198" class="">lived</st> as a <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> I <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> here <st data-num="2919">on trial</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909">because of</st> my <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> in the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st> made <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="2" />

a promise<n id="1" /> that <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1429">twelve tribes</st> <st data-num="1679">hope</st> to <st data-num="2658" class="">attain</st> as they <st data-num="1616" class="">earnestly</st> <st data-num="3000" class="">serve</st> God<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>. <st data-num="4012" class="">Concerning</st> <st data-num="3739">this</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> are <st data-num="1458" class="">accusing</st> me,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="935">Your Majesty</st>!<n id="4" />

<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2919" class="">think</st><n id="2" /> it is <st data-num="571" class="">unbelievable</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1487">that</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raises</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>?

<st data-num="3767">Of course</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st> was <st data-num="1380" class="">convinced</st><n id="2" /> that it <st data-num="1163">was necessary</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4238" class="">do</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st> <st data-num="1727" class="">hostile</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> that is <st data-num="3739">what</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>: Not only did <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2623" class="">lock up</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prisons</st> by the <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> I <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3844">from</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st>, <st data-num="5037">but</st> I also <st data-num="2702" class="">cast</st> my <st data-num="5586" class="">vote</st><n id="2" /> against <st data-num="846">them</st> when they were sentenced to <st data-num="337" class="">death</st>.<n id="3" />
I punished them often in all the synagogues and tried to force them to blaspheme. Because I was so furiously enraged at them, I went to persecute them even in foreign cities.
“While doing this very thing, as I was going to Damascus with authority and complete power from the chief priests,

about <st data-num="2250 3319">noon</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>, <st data-num="935">Your Majesty</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="3771">from heaven</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2987" class="">brighter</st> than the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st>, <st data-num="4034">shining everywhere around</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those <st data-num="4198" class="">traveling</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

When <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> had <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2667" class="">fallen</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>, I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> in <st data-num="1446" class="">Aramaic</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4549" class="">‘Saul</st>, <st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuting</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>? <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="4642">hurting</st> yourself<n id="2" /> by <st data-num="2979" class="">kicking</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="2979">goads</st>.’<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> you, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>?’ <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuting</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="450">get up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="3708" class="">appeared</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st><st data-num="1519 3778"> this reason</st>, to <st data-num="4400" class="">designate</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4400" class="">in advance</st><n id="1" /> as a <st data-num="5257" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="3739">the things</st><n id="3" /> you have <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5037">and</st> to <st data-num="3739">the things</st> in which I will <st data-num="3708" class="">appear</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

I will <st data-num="1807" class="">rescue</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> your own <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="649" class="">sending</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>

to open their eyes so that they turn from darkness to light and from the power of Satan to God, so that they may receive forgiveness of sins and a share among those who are sanctified by faith in me.’
“Therefore, King Agrippa, I was not disobedient to the heavenly vision,

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="518" class="">declared</st> to those <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then to those in <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="5037">and</st> in <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>, that they should <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1994" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4238" class="">performing</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="514" class="">consistent</st> with<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>.

<st data-num="1752" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">reason</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>, after they <st data-num="4815" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> while I <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="3987" class="">trying</st> to <st data-num="1315" class="">kill</st> me.

I have <st data-num="5177" class="">experienced</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1947" class="">help</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, and so I <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="3143" class="">testifying</st> to <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="3398" class="">small</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1622" class="">except</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> and <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st><n id="3" /> was <st data-num="3195" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="1096">happen</st>:
that the Christ was to suffer and be the first to rise from the dead, to proclaim light both to our people and to the Gentiles.”
As Paul was saying these things in his defense, Festus exclaimed loudly, “You have lost your mind, Paul! Your great learning is driving you insane!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3105" class="">lost</st> my <st data-num="3105" class="">mind</st>, <st data-num="2903">most excellent</st> <st data-num="5347" class="">Festus</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> am <st data-num="669" class="">speaking</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="225" class="">true</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4997" class="">rational</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="1987" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>, and I am <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="3955" class="">freely</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">cannot</st> <st data-num="3982" class="">believe</st><n id="3" /> that <st data-num="5100">any</st> of <st data-num="3778">these things</st> has <st data-num="2990">escaped his notice</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4238" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="1137" class="">corner</st>.<n id="5" />

Do you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="935" class="">King</st> <st data-num="67" class="">Agrippa</st>?<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.”

<st data-num="67" class="">Agrippa</st><n id="1" /> said <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, “<st data-num="1722">In</st> such a <st data-num="3641">short time</st> are you <st data-num="3982" class="">persuading</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="5546" class="">Christian</st>?”<n id="2" />
Paul replied, “I pray to God that whether in a short or a long time not only you but also all those who are listening to me today could become such as I am, except for these chains.”
So the king got up, and with him the governor and Bernice and those sitting with them,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> as they were <st data-num="402" class="">leaving</st> they <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> is <st data-num="3762" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4238" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="514" class="">deserving</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st>.”
Agrippa said to Festus, “This man could have been released if he had not appealed to Caesar.”
